F3_MailformPlusPlus_View_Multistep::addHiddenFields ( &$  markers  )  [protected]

Adds the values stored in $_SESSION as hidden fields in marker ##ADDITIONAL_MULTISTEP###.

Needed in conditional forms.

Parameters:
array &$markers The markers to put the new one into
